name: VR WW2
description:
You can time travel to the World War 2.
You must shoot down enemy machine looming.

There is a VR mode and normal mode.
You can experience the force of overwhelming air war in VR mode.

If you have Google Cardboard and other similar HMD,
you enjoy the game in VR mode.

>VR mode / Tilt mode / Touch mode
* VR mode is not available on iPad.
>Change speed ( max / mid / min)
>Change view (cocpit / flight)
>Change weapons ( FLare Gun / Mini Gun)
>Leaderboard
- Fight with the user around the world!
>Achievement
- Get the items!

you can check Record.
you can check help.


music by : Music Atelier Amacha
developed by Unity
